org.daisy.braille.utils.impl.tools.embosser

Class SimpleEmbosserProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.braille.utils.impl.tools.embosser.SimpleEmbosserProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InternalEmbosserWriterProperties, org.daisy.dotify.api.embosser.EmbosserWriterProperties

    public final class SimpleEmbosserProperties
extends Object
implements InternalEmbosserWriterProperties
    Provides an immutable implementation of EmbosserWriterProperties.
